name: Artemis
intro: Data dashboard product for major L1 blockchains
introduce: Artemis is building a suite of products that makes crypto data more accessible for investors and builders. ​Gokustats is its data dashboard product that allows for easy analysis and comparison of major L1 blockchains. For each L1, the dashboard includes data on undamentals (addresses, transactions, TVL), stablecoin flows, social data (twitter followers), trading behavior (price, market cap), valuation multiples. For select blockchains (such as Solana), the dashboards also include chain specific KPIs such as transactions per second (TPS), incidents, DEX volumes, and NFT trades.
